edu.iu.harp.client

Class DataSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.harp.client.Sender
      • edu.iu.harp.client.DataSender
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataChainBcastSender, DataMSTBcastSender

    public class DataSender
extends Sender
    The actual sender for sending the data. Different from DataReceiver, we don't release the encoded bytes in failures.
